code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer doCatRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) {     final String message = request.param("message", "Hello from Cat Example action").     Table table = getTableWithHeader(request).     table.startRow().     table.addCell(message).     table.endRow().     return channel -> {         try {             channel.sendResponse(RestTable.buildResponse(table, channel)).         } catch (final Exception e) {             channel.sendResponse(new BytesRestResponse(channel, e)).         }     }. }

@Override protected Table getTableWithHeader(RestRequest request) {     final Table table = new Table().     table.startHeaders().     table.addCell("test", "desc:test").     table.endHeaders().     return table. }
